main event: On the evening of July 3, 1949, an observer reported seeing a strange aircraft in the sky over Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 500 feet long and 50 feet high,The object had 3 or 4 windows that emitted a very bright light and trailed a cherry-red tail of fire 100 feet long,The sighting lasted approximately 10-15 seconds,The observer reported that the craft was traveling at a great rate of speed from South to North,The witness further commented that the craft did not resemble a typical flying saucer.
sighted object: a strange aircraft with windows and a flaming tail
witness description: the observer was on the ground and estimated the object's distance and size
